description: ADK Agent Simple template for building intelligent competitor analysis platform with ADK-powered agents

changelog.2.0.0: Initial release with ADK agent development functionality for competitor analysis
changelog.2.0.1: Add Windsurf and Claude Code rule variants.
changelog.2.0.2: Add MCP support for context7 and time in mcp.json for Claude Code.
changelog.2.0.4: Add Claude command support for all prep and dev templates
changelog.2.0.5: Enhanced landing page generation with AI visual prompt system and layout-driven visual strategy
changelog.2.0.6: Add task_review.md and worktree.md for development workflows, fix Tailwind version in docs
